author: karenkent13
title: A lovely friendly hotel . Would not hesitate to return if visiting Paris location excellent
text: The staff were amazing special mentions to Julie , Fiona , and the pretty Malaysian receptionist apologies who I have forgotten her name . We asked for recommendation for restaurant which was provided didn't dissapoint. We ate the second night at the champs elyees plaza and again the food was gorgeous along with brilliant service
